website_summaries.verdict: Classic, sleek mugs made from heat and condensation-resistant borosilicate glass.
pros: The thin glass construction and convenient handle keep your espresso hot and your hands cool
These mugs also hold a whopping 5.4 ounces of liquid
cons: Some found the glass to be too delicate, resulting in cracks or leaks from dishwasher use

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in powder form (updated)
customer_reviews.text: Initial reaction... Upset. Didn't arrive just broken, but totally shattered... Like my expectations. UPDATE: There are no words that can describe the customer service other than "perfect". After reading my review, the co-founder, Martin sent out a replacement set of glasses immediately. Five star service deserves to be recognized.
customer_reviews.author: BlumPhotography

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set of two cups for my Pixie espresso machine. The set of cups I already had did not accommodate the larger volume of Lungo. Not only are the JoyJolt Mugs the right size, but they are light and sturdy, and due to the double-wall design, they retain the heat of my drink longer than my ceramic cups. Plus they were a steal - a well-known kitchen supply store wanted close to $25 for ONE double-wall Lungo cup. The photo shows the little happy corner on my credenza in my office!
customer_reviews.author: bearandbu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Espresso Cups!
customer_reviews.text: I got my husband a mini Nespresso machine, but it didn't come with cups. He tried using a regular cup but that didn't work out. Back I went to Amazon, found these (how nice that you get a pair) and ordered them. Thanks to Prime, two days later he was sipping his espresso from this perfect little cup. It is just the right size, double walled and insulated, sleek design and dishwasher safe - just what we needed. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: SoozeSays

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking coffee glasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking coffee glasses Dishwasher safe Bigger than the traditional Nespresso glasses (see picture)
customer_reviews.author: Enrique P.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely glasses. And awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful glasses for espresso. One of the glasses leaked about a month later. Martin from Joy Jolt sent me a nice e-mail. Then sent me out a new set of glasses, and accompanied by a lovely letter! This company is all about customer service that goes above and beyond!! I love these beautiful espresso glasses. Thank you Joy Jolt Drinkware. And Thank you Martin. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good mugs, great service
customer_reviews.text: The mugs are awesome, and Essential Products Service was even better. I had a little hiccup with the shipment (cracked mug) and they sent another immediately. Good dudes.
customer_reviews.author: Jibbonte

customer_reviews.title: Non-Scientific Test
customer_reviews.text: As I chemical engineer, I like to know the facts. So I decided to do a little test. I poured 200 F water into the glass, up to the very top, for 2 minutes to preheat the cup. Then I emptied the cup and waited 2 minutes. Then I placed 198 F water into the glass and started the timer. After 2 minutes, the water was 185.5 F. After another 2 minutes the water temperature dropped to 175 F. Overall, I would say these are pretty good cups. The only negative comment I have about these cups is they are very light. If these cups had thicker glass walls, I would give them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Veritas13

customer_reviews.title: cools down quicker than regular ceramic or glass cup
customer_reviews.text: Very very dissapointed: cools down hot coffe or tea much quicker than regular ceramic or glass cup. In addition those cups look like cheap piece of plastic with etched white logo in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality coffee cups
customer_reviews.text: These cups are fantastic. I used to have a couple of ceramic Lungo cups from Nespresso. After breaking one I bought a pair of these Joy Jolt Glasses. First of all, I love that they are glass. Second, they keep your coffee hot much longer then a normal cup. Third, everyone that sees me drinking my Nespresso in one of these cups asks me to make one for them! They are super easy to hand wash and I also love the fact that I can throw them in the dishwasher. I ended up buying a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: When we first received the glass espresso cups, we LOVED them. Fast forward to several months later and we are very disappointed! As you can see in the photos, the cup has started to crack in the inside... CRAZY! Obliviously we have been pouring hot espresso into the espresso cups. Pretty sad that it can't make it even 1 year without cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our coffee loving household
customer_reviews.text: I am overjoyed at the size of the cups. I brew nespresso lungo size and the ounce size is perfect for the coffee and rum chata. Fits well in the hand and coffee stays hot till the very last sip. They are glass so, I plan to treat them as such. But Joy Jolt must be proud of their products because they stamp each one. I plan to purchase the tumblers next.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Shatters the record on cheap glass!
customer_reviews.text: This scores a 10 out of 10 in the categories of Most Explosive and Most Fragile. Drop one of these babies, and you'll be picking confetti-sized shared of glass out of your carpet and window curtains for weeks - even after vacuuming! And did I mention fragile? Don't stack a dish on this one, or BOOM! Glass sparkle party in your dishwasher. This product can only be recommended for: 1. Sopranos looking to impress their friends 2. Gifts to family you don't like 3. A memorable "I'm out " moment while breaking up with an SO
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cups for Nespresso Lungos
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful cups that are just the right size for a nespresso Lungo sized beverage (see pic). I have a small machine, an Essenza Mini. A regular cup won't fit without removing the little cup holder. This cup fits perfectly. I'm really enjoying the feel and shape of the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wood

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly incredible!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! When I first took them out of the box I was instantly disappointed because they felt light and cheap. But then I realized that they really are glass and they really are just light. Still, I was skeptical until I poured my first espresso - then WOW! The outer glass stays cool to the touch no matter what, while the hot beverage stays hot. Drinking from them is exquisite. I'm in awe at how great these are. Big YES from me!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper17

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality - Can't be Glass
customer_reviews.text: I took one mug out of the box and was appalled to find the product was plastic. Felt like plastic, very light and hollow like plastic, looks like plastic, and when I put it down or tap it with anything, it sounds like plastic. I read the box carefully and saw it stated "glass with class"... whatever that means. I didn't even bother using it, put it right back in the box to return. Especially at the price I paid for it, definitely would not have expected such low cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Iman Abouelazm

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This double insulated glass are great! I have been using them almost everyday for last 2 wks. When I first received the order one of them had a crack by the handle and the seller sent me a new one. Easy to communicate and great customer service. They are well made, very lightweight, easy to handle, doesn't transfer heat no more burn hands, keeps the drink warmer longer too. I am enjoying it. They also make a great gift. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mahi

customer_reviews.title: Not so fancy with water in the double wall
customer_reviews.text: In less than 2 weeks, one of the cups lost its vacuum seal and water penetrated the double wall area. Perhaps if the manufacturer could devise a way to have the seal where the handle is to reinforce it when the handle is placed, they would never experience another disappointed customer.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but wish it was a little heavier
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and cute cups! It keep my lungos warm for longer. They are really lightweight, but seem durable enough. I do wish they were a tad but heavier though. They are so lightweight that when I place the cup on the platform of my espresso maker, I have to hold the cup while the espresso brews. Otherwise, the vibrations from the maker, cause the lightweight cup to vibrate right off the edge...which can chase a huge mess. Taking off one star for that. Btw, these have been holding up fine in my dishwasher. I never have to hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Arh

customer_reviews.title: Probably the coolest cup I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over in brick and mortar stores and could not find a small cup. Found this one on Amazon, liked the idea of double wall so I ordered a pair. They are a bit pricy, however, I'm using way less coffee due to the fact that I'm not gulping it when it quickly goes luke warm.. This sucker keeps my Nespresso quite warm the entire time I enjoy it. I'm quite amazed at how they manage to make these neat little cups! The only thing I'd suggest is to make the handle a bit rounder. It's a somewhat flat piece of glass that would be more comfortable to hold if it was round.
customer_reviews.author: generallyinterested

customer_reviews.title: A perfect little espresso cup
customer_reviews.text: A perfect little espresso cup! Perfect size! Perfect shape! It just can't get any better than that. P.S. my espresso pot is for 3 cups and it makes enough coffee for exactly one cup, so if you want to make two cups of coffee buy 6 cups one.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived and already broken.
customer_reviews.text: Just received these tonight. Removed them from box and left in counter. Hubby moved them over together and one cracked. Faulty? Poor durability? We didn’t even get to use them yet. Very sad because they are beautiful and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, simple, functional, affordable larger espresso glasses/cups
customer_reviews.text: So glad I picked these out of all the choices on Amazon. They are very simple, yet I think nice looking at the same time. I love how large the handle is because I prefer to hold a cup with a handle and I tend to walk around as I'm drinking my espresso. Fits Lungo perfectly, or double espresso shots. I get my new Barista Milk Machine from Nespresso today, so I will be trying these out with one of their drink recipes that come with the machine. Can't wait! I would highly recommend these to anyone, and I would give them as gifts if more of my family and friends drank espresso like I do!
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: Used and washed once. One of the glasses got ...
customer_reviews.text: Used and washed once. One of the glasses got water between the two layers of glass. Threw it out. Won't buy this brand again. Cheap quality. UPDATE: Received a package today with a letter from the CEO apologizing for the defective glass. Company sent a replacement for BOTH glasses plus a gift of 6 shot glasses (nice heavy quality). Very classy (and proactive) customer service. Increased review to three stars as a result. I will give these new glasses a go for our morning pick me up.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than you would expect for espresso cups- the tile is quite misleading
customer_reviews.text: These look like great MUGS... Not espresso cups. Espresso cups are much smaller and was surprised to see how big they actually are. Can easily fit 4 espresso shots. I took a picture next to my espresso cups and you can see the difference clearly. If you want larger espresso mugs to add milk etc. these may be the right ones for you but for my pure doubleshot espresso it is too large.
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: Really impressive clear glass cup
customer_reviews.text: The JoyJolt Savor is larger than you might think an espresso cup should be, because of the double-hull construction, but is actually the perfect size for a 'lungo' espresso, basically a double. Nespresso recommends a 5 oz cup for a lungo coffee and the Savor is 5.4 ounces. The overall cup is larger because of the double hull, but it fits neatly into the standard cup tray of a Nespresso Essenza Mini. The cup is made of borosilicate glass, which is heat resistant and durable. It is very lightweight and absolutely clear. The finished coffee and crema look gorgeous in the clear glass, suspended inside the cup. I'm loving this cup.
customer_reviews.author: Dree of Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: great product, rapid vendor response
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed using the insulated glass espresso mugs for the first time today. The size is perfect for Lungo size coffee from the Nesspresso maker. One use will not define this products durabilty, but with this light weight glass, I will be very careful washing them. Kept my coffee warm much longer than even pre-heating my coffee cup was doing. Vendor contacted me before receiving product, and immediately after, making me think customer service would be very good if a problem popped up. In summation, I would buy this again, and likely will buy at least 2 more to complete my set. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dreary

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Sure they are "handmade" however they are espresso shot glasses and soooooo overpriced. Just a glass, guys! And, as a handmade item - the unfinished area where the flute attached to the glass blow portion is a weak area soon to break. As a person who has blown glass, this area is not only weak but unprofessional from the standpoint of a proper finish. Perhaps they leave it to give it more of an artisan look? :(
customer_reviews.author: DustyFadedSpaceship

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: I liked these mugs, could get a good cappuccino in it. But a little over a month into using them infrequently, the outer wall allowed water into the insulating layer and now constantly looks dirty. Otherwise, they're great mugs if you're cool with dishwater water or whatever that got in the insulating layer hanging out there forever. Tried to drain the thing for a few days and still had a noticeable amount of fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Tait

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Really Keep Drinks Hot
customer_reviews.text: These mugs look OK and are easy to handle. But they really don’t do all that they’re supposed to do which is keep liquids hot/cold longer. I hate drinking lukewarm tea or coffee so I am always having to jump up and stick my mug in the microwave. Maybe I was expecting too much, but I haven’t noticed that my drinks stay any hotter than before. Cold drinks seem to stay colder a bit longer, but that’s not why I bought these mugs. So I probably wouldn’t buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: LagunaLady

customer_reviews.title: Just LOVE them
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for these type of cups for quite some time, but most of the time they tend to be very expensive. I saw these and wanted to give them a try and I am not disappointed!! :-) I love them!!! You can put them in the dish washer, but I don't recommend because they can scratch with the other dishes. So hand wash them! Overall I am really satisfied with my purchase and they just are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: poufrederick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the home barista experimenter
customer_reviews.text: I got an espresso machine on Black Friday and wanted to get some glasses that were smaller than a traditional coffee mug. That’s where these guys come in. They are a little bigger than I was expecting, leaving a little room for more than a double shot. That being said, I love them! They keep the espresso hot while not scalding your hand on the outside. They are also pretty sturdy. I’ve banged them around the kitchen multiple times and they are still going strong. I will definitely come back when I need to re-order.
customer_reviews.author: MinterLuck

customer_reviews.title: Ok if you only hand wash, I guess
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of mugs roughly 4 months ago. I was concerned, frankly, that I would break them because they are so light. Turns out that was unfounded because my concern should have been dishwasher water and sediment somehow getting in between the walls and their is no way for it to drain. Mind blown.
customer_reviews.author: HeyItsMe

customer_reviews.title: Great little cups
customer_reviews.text: These cups are great for my nespresso machine. I can make an esspresso or a lungo with these, and they are just fine. The only reason I docked them one star is because the bottom of the cups are so slick, they will slip off the machine while brewing if you don't hold on to them. The vibration from the brewing process shakes them right off the machine. I have ceramic cups that have a standard unfinished foot, and they stay put just fine. Other than the slippiness, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Nikonian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those Amazon finds where you feel you got more than you paid for. The glasses are very classy looking and super solid. I'm sure if you chucked them at the floor they would shatter but they appear very well made. They have a good weight to them and the actual glass is very clear which enhances the visual effect of the floating liquid inside. The real hook is the price though. Not sure how much it cost to make these things but If I got them for 3 times what I paid I would probably still consider it a deal. Great value here for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: jptsr1

customer_reviews.title: Second set - Still loving them.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the look for a standard Americano coming from most espresso machines (about 4oz.) Empty and clean they sparkle. But full you can watch the cascade of the crema. Come for the java shot, stay for the show. I got the second set because I shattered one. I've dropped on hardwood and it bounced along the floor. To get one to implode you have to chuck it against a granite counter top. (was about to drop it, tried to save it but ended up thrusting it against a countertop after a couple bobbles. )
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Civello

customer_reviews.title: These are great. No fogging, look good, and they work
customer_reviews.text: Double walled glasses have lots of troubles. They can fog from a plug that doesn't work. They can be cheap and break They can be poorly made with lots of obvious imperfections. These are great. So far, multiple washings and no fogging or issues. I use them for espresso with froth, cappuccino, coffee, tea, and multiple hot drinks. They are great, look good, and have held up. They cost a little more, but worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: HomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Espresso never tasted better!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered my first Nespresso machine and I knew I needed the "proper glassware" to enjoy my espresso. The machine came equipped to serve both espresso and lungo sizes. That made these two cups the perfect match at 5.40z. The double-insulation never gets hot on the outside, and the handle is easy to hold anyway. I prefer clear cups because I can see the rich, boldness of the espresso and the foam on top. Yummy! Super fast shipping, and would highly recommend for such great value too!
customer_reviews.author: rreyna20

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than expected but still great!
customer_reviews.text: These cups are MUCH bigger than I expected. I have a nespresso maker at home and the espresso function barely puts a dent in the cup. I have not tested but I would expect it would take about 4 “espresso” brews to actually fill the cups. Otherwise these are a great product for espresso cups! They have worked perfectly for me at home. They hold warmth well and do not make the outside hot at all. You have to be cautious while handling as they feel very fragile. The first set arrived shattered and Amazon was quick to assist with sending a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Brighten up your mornings!
customer_reviews.text: These thermal double walled espresso mugs are lightweight yet seem sturdy (although I'm not the one willing to test durability ;) ) they make it more of a joy to make my morning double shots, being able to watch the caramel-colored lusciousness streaming into the mug! They come in pairs, so I'll have to buy another set if I want to serve guests...
customer_reviews.author: 916Funkster

customer_reviews.title: Decadent and cool to the touch with boiling hot liquid in the cup.
customer_reviews.text: These are fancy glasses that remain cool to the touch because they are double insulated. I like the way the liquid looks likes it's floating in the glass. They feel lighter than a regular glass cup, some would say that's a good thing, some would say it feels cheaper or lesser quality that way, I guess it's a personal preference in what you prefer. I like them very much. I use them for espresso, coffee and tea. As they are bigger than a shot glass and smaller than an average sized mug.
customer_reviews.author: Boycech

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love my double wall insulated glasses espresso mugs. Is the perfect size for my Nespresso machine and the coffee stays hot but not to the touch. The glass is easy to clean and shiny (no more ugly coffee stains). I am actually saving money since I don't waste coffee by over pouring in a large mug, to end up not drinking it. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Very Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feedback after 4 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cups. They are well insulated which helps to keep the drink (in my case coffee) at the right temperature, and look really good. The reason why I don't give 5 stars is due to some marks (they look blurred) on the glass after a few months of use (see pics). They are washed in a dishwasher only so I don't have a good explanation for this. Other than that, great cups.
customer_reviews.author: Raf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Nespresso OriginalLine Lungo 5.4 oz drink
customer_reviews.text: This cup is just the perfect size for the Lungo (5.4 oz) Nespresso coffee. 5.4 oz of coffee leaves about 3/8" from the top of the cup. It also fits my Breville Nespresso Mini perfectly without removing the catch tray. The double wall glass keeps the outside wall cool and the coffee hot. Not sure how long it lasts but appears well made and should last long if handled carefully.
customer_reviews.author: JAS32

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I feel very sophisticated drinking from this. Perfectly fits a lungo size from my new Nespresso mini. If you are thinking about getting a Nespresso do that now. Really enjoying it and these cups add to that. Plus it does keep it warmer than a regular cup. And it's nice to see the coffee with the crema on top.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little cups
customer_reviews.text: I bought my wife a fancy espresso machine for Christmas this year, and she picked these little cups to catch the espresso for her favorite home made coffee drinks. We haven't broken them so far (knock on wood, as they feel super dainty and breakable), and are wide enough to catch espresso from both spouts. Plus, when not in use, they sit on the window sill and are just aesthetically pleasing little items. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.

customer_reviews.title: Cool to touch but did not retain heat
customer_reviews.text: I filled the JoyJolt cup and a Corning both with hot water, 190 degrees. After 5 minutes, both cups measured 160 degrees. After 10 minutes, the JoyJolt cup measured 143 degrees while the Corning cup was at 147 degrees. The JoyJolt cup is pretty to look at and the outside did remain cool to the touch but it did not stand up to the temperature test. It didn't make sense to me either. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Expresso cups for cappuccinos and cafe mocha
customer_reviews.text: The cups look nice. Gave only 4 stars as the first pair that arrived, one of the cup’s glass was a bit warped and uneven. I exchanged them for another set. I’m happy with the final result. They are the perfect size cups for a Bialetti Moka Express (3-cup) pot. Which makes two expresso drinks. If you’re gifting someone the cups or the Bialetti get them together. And a powerlix electric milk frother. The trifecta is an awesome gift combo.
customer_reviews.author: John Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: These were bigger than I expected. Unfortunately they don't both sit in my espresso machine simultaneously, but that's probably because my machine is small. But that's my fault. After leaving a so-so review, JoyJolt sent me replacement smaller glasses to try with my machine. I haven't gotten a chance to use them yet, but they do both sit in my machine perfectly. I always appreciate great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Kodi

customer_reviews.title: Better than Dragon Glassware
customer_reviews.text: When we got our espresso machine, we purchased the Dragon glassware espresso cups. Worked okay for only a few months, but the handle didn't seem study on them, which was correct, cause it ended up breaking off and stabbing me... These JoyJolt espresso cups was a much needed upgrade! Very study and quality is great! The double insulation keeps the liquid warm so you don't have to drink it all in one gulp. Definitely would get more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: yenniepooh

customer_reviews.title: Look Cool, But Very Fragile
customer_reviews.text: As far as performance, these glasses are great. Perfect for pulling shots into and then making Americanos or cappuccinos as they don't get too hot and insulate very well. The big problem is that they are INCREDIBLY fragile. We broke 4 in six months, and we didn't drop any of them, they just fell over in the sink and cracked. It was often hard to tell that they were cracked and we only noticed when they filled up with water in the inside. These look great and function well, but my guess is you will be replacing them all the time as they break pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Marin

customer_reviews.title: Hot Espresso!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I didn't get these espresso glasses sooner! My espresso stays hot much longer. In fact I don't think my other cups worked half as well and I didn't realize what I was missing. These espresso glasses (cups) are light-weight and easy to hold. They fit perfectly under my Nespresso Inissia machine and look great filled with espresso! They were packaged well and arrived quickly. I highly recommend these cups.
customer_reviews.author: BookMistress

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: I had the joy jolt 2.? oz espresso cups (without the handles). They were fantastic. Still are. But it always bothered me that I never got the size to accommodate a lungo. And now I do. Also, I broke one of the original 2oz cups - ( be warned with any of these double walled glass cups, from any manufacturer, it will sound like a gun shot and glass will be everywhere) - so I decided to replace my set with these. Really do no issue. They perform the way they are supposed to. I would probably always buy joy jolt if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: norm

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Not having espresso in a white cup seems like an abomination (the color of the coffee against the cup is important). The insulating property of the double wall cup allows me to savor the taste for many slow wonderful sips over a longer period of time than a usual cup. If the company could make this cup in white glass it would be sybaritic.
customer_reviews.author: cosmo2

customer_reviews.title: A good mug at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving 4 stars due to what some others have noted - the thickness of the glass. Don't get me wrong, i like them and use one every day for my espresso fix, but the just feel flimsy, They are not, as I routinely stir with a metal spoon and am not overly cautious when washing, but they are so light I just feel that way. Looks good, keeps the espresso warm longer than bone china, and is a lot of fun to watch the espresso being made into the clear glass. I would deffinatly buy again if I ever need more than just the 2.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Moleman

customer_reviews.title: So far they are my fave
customer_reviews.text: I love these for my morning shot of love. They are the perfect size for a double shot but if you like a lot of foam, get the size larger. And, hand wash-they are fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Fit Hot MEss

customer_reviews.title: great mugs
customer_reviews.text: One for me the other one for my half, every morning (Covid19 times ;)) into the poorly designed De'Longhi machine where this is the only cup that fits into. I was afraid that the bottom plug will allow water to enter between walls but everything seems to be properly made since I had zero problems with them for about one year.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable first impression
customer_reviews.text: I've only had my mugs for 24 hours, so it's premature to rate durability. However, I am delighted with them. They are beautiful to look at - I love the minimalist/modern vibe. The handle is comfortable (beating out my previous espresso mugs) and they really do keep my hot drinks hot for longer than a ceramic mug does. I'm sipping the perfect little cup of matcha tea and patting myself on my own back for reading ALL the reviews (compulsive little me) and choosing this perfect little mug.
customer_reviews.author: AMQCS

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a glass to hold a lungo shot from my Nespresso and these are just the ticket. Wanted a clear glass to appreciate the crema and these are double-walled to boot which keeps the coffee warmer longer. They are just the prefect size for the lungo shot. I have only put them in the dishwasher once, but there was no sign of condensation like have seen reported for other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Space

customer_reviews.title: Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know where to start. Out of the box the glasses had weird bubbles inside of the "glass". Both shattered within a week even though I hardly used them and gently washed them. If you're looking for quality and durability they are severely lacking in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great when it isn't broken
customer_reviews.text: I will update the review as I go. This came to me as one broken and one fine. The one that was fine handled well as is as authentic as you can pretty much get with the mug size you would find in Italy. It kept my latte warm and heated up nicely. I asked for a replacement and it was ordered for me, so I hope that doesn't get charged to my account. But I'll see about that later. After using this one for a few days and once I receive my replacement I'll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a Lungo but more delicate than other glass mugs
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to have the perfect size for a Lungo shot and it holds the temperature very well. It is more delicate than other glass mugs. Accidentally knocked several of mug glass mugs off the counter onto a wood floor - the Nespresso and Anchor mugs (two ends of the expense spectrum) survived, this one did not.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I expected; smaller than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: For someone who is a first time "home barista" these cups are amazing. They suit my needs and a lot more durable than I truly expected them to be. There is nothing about these cups that I do not like. They fit well in my hand and holds the perfect amount for my espressos. If you are looking for cups to also enjoy your lattes with, then I would not suggest these. They are what the description says.."espresso mugs"
customer_reviews.author: MarCia

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Crafted Espresso Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses, smooth edges, clean lines, and perfect size for making a variety of "barista" style drinks. Highly recommend. Also we use with a Nespresso Pixie and it fits perfect. Because they are made of the double wall glass they do appear quite fragile so be careful with them. Highly recommend and will probably purchase two more.
customer_reviews.author: Orion and Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase and will be buying more
customer_reviews.text: I love drinking my expresso in the morning and these cups are perfect. I bought 2 cups about 1 year ago and im very pleased with the quality and sturdiness of these cups so I bought 2 more recently. I get a lot of compliments on these cups when i have guests over because of how cool it looks when coffee is inside. I will buy 2 more so i will ha e a set of 6. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Artem I.

customer_reviews.title: A new rendering of an old idea...
customer_reviews.text: Holds heated fluid in inner cup while keeping outer cup cool to the touch. Why aren't all cups/containers made this way? Imagine a steaming cup of soup on a cold day you can comfortably hold in your hand These cups are the answer. They are light easy to clean and not fragile. I am ordering more for myself and for friends. Very impressive
customer_reviews.author: Walt Laramie

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Unbreakable, but do not look and feel high end as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because they were advertised as glass and while they may be categorized as this, they feel and sound like heavy plastic. I am giving them as a gift to my father in law now, who has tremor issues and the sturdiness will be good for him, but they do not look and feel as high end as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice fun little cups.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice little cups I use with my Nesresso 1.7 oz. Espressos. There is enough room for the frothy milk on top as well. They are fun to use and everyone marvels at the double layers. Nice for small mochas and lattes too. They seem to be durable of course I handle them with reasonable care. I wash them in the dishwasher they come out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Schoch

customer_reviews.title: Small and too fragile
customer_reviews.text: These cups feel like they will break in your hand. I don’t like them and never use them because I’m afraid of breaking them. Also, they are very small cups. I’m a heavy coffee/tea drinker and these cups can’t cut it. I wish the glass used did not feel paper thin. :/
customer_reviews.author: Dalya84

customer_reviews.title: Expresso Done Right
customer_reviews.text: Well made and well packaged. I bought a second set, one of which was shattered...I can't fathom how...the packaging was perfect, I think the delivery guy must have Ace Ventura'd it walking up to the door. Anyway, Amazon and the reseller had a new set to me in a couple of days, easy peasy. These are the perfect size to capture a double shot from my expresso machine and clean up easy. Good looking, too!
customer_reviews.author: Brock Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not Nespresso friendly:(
customer_reviews.text: I actually love these but I can’t use them for Nespresso... I bought them to use with my Nespresso machine and they’re too small so I’ve got to put another cup quickly underneath to save the rest of the espresso. I can’t find a setting on my machine to limit the ounces to accommodate the cups. Great product otherwise just thought I’d note this in case other shoppers intend on using these for Nespresso as well:)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for something sleek and function and these ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something sleek and function and these hit the mark! I was worried that they would be too fragile but have had no issues with breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Rylee

customer_reviews.title: This product works wonderfully for those who enjoy Nespresso products
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonderfully for those who enjoy Nespresso products, especially the Lungo line. The cup design helps the cream seal in the flavors of the coffee, The Vertuo product may require the larger size
customer_reviews.author: Sevenseas888

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: The product was not durable. I dropped it from an inch and it broke. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Just thick glass
customer_reviews.text: I took a second look after returning since what I received did not look as described or as other reviewers pictured them to be. I was correct. I did not receive double glass insulated cups just thick cups like I get at the Dollar Store.
customer_reviews.author: NCSC

customer_reviews.title: Just not enough...
customer_reviews.text: A lotta trouble to keep your drink hotter, a little while longer. It seems to me, that there is too much area exposed to air, to keep the liquid hot for any length of time. Maybe I should have bought a larger size. Everything else about the cups are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: peterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice shape and size
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to try double walled glass espresso cups, but I've never seen them in a size I like until now. These are perfect for a cappacino or an americano/long black. They don't keep your drink any warmer than a heavy ceramic cup, but they're pretty cool. I wish they came with a saucer is my only gripe.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and as described!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Fits a lungo and a splash of milk. Can also fit on small shelf underneath the spout of a Nespresso Creatista. I can’t remember if these are plastic or glass, but the cup feels pretty solid. The material is thick and the handle has enough room for two fingers.
customer_reviews.author: A SaramaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say that these necessarily keep my coffee any warmer than a regular mug. However, they're really sturdy and the perfect size for my nespresso machine. I can fit a double espresso with foam in here perfectly! I love these little mugs!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are larger than your typical single and even double shot mugs, but are a nice size, smaller than a standard coffee mug. They seem sturdy, yet are light and very comfortable. I’ve only done double shot espresso, but based on it only being half full, a smaller latte or cappuccino would seem totally doable.
customer_reviews.author: bsnow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Espresso Cups!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the glass felt a little odd or plastic-y but read about the tempered glass and it holds up in the heat of the microwave and in the dishwasher. They are the perfect size to hold a double espresso or lungo shot. Use them every day and most likely will get more!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Good Size
customer_reviews.text: These expresso cups fit perfectly in our Nespresso. They allow the coffee to stay hot much longer due to the insulation value of the duel sides. I just hope the remain clear of scratches and hold up well. Seems to be good quality of glass.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cups
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after I read about how the double walled insulated glasses keep your hot drinks warm and cold drinks cool for longer periods of time. This product works as advertised. Definitely keeps my hot drinks warm longer than any ceramic mug we have. The view through the glass is also attractive. I haven't put these in the dishwasher yet and have been hand washing only after several reviews that they are not as sturdy. Therefore, I cannot speak to the durability yet. But they certainly feel extra light.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a double espresso!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would only hold one espresso but it was bigger than I thought. It can fit up to 4 espressos. The double wall insulation makes it easier to hold (it won't burn your hands). It keeps my coffee warm and fits under my espresso machine perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Ella Lim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and durable
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for coffee, I got tired of busting the larger thermal ones and having my cup go cold. I thought they would be too small, but they are actually a perfect sub for a regular china cup. They have a thicker handle too, and have survived the dishwasher even thought that's not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These cups feel remarkably flimsy. Yet, they do what they claim to do. They keep the coffee nice and hot. You can easily and comfortably hold a nice hot cup of espresso in your hand. They cups are growing on me.
customer_reviews.author: WillardJames

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The simplicity of this product makes it a pleasure to use. My wife and I enjoy the well insulated glass as we can see our morning coffee, which is kept warm and doesn't' burn our hands. A well designed concept. Happy to recommend this product to others,
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH L. WILSON

customer_reviews.title: May favorite tea cup.
customer_reviews.text: Being an avid tea drinker, love the presentation and the amount it holds. Used to have the caribou brand cups which with a little bigger but this one works better. Have gifted multiple sets to friends and family in the past.
customer_reviews.author: SAMIRK

customer_reviews.title: Great pour, Great handling and smart purchase
customer_reviews.text: I went to three stores looking for espresso cups for my newest appliance and the best I could find is a top brand holiday ornament. Frustrated, I came home to Amazon and I found these glasses. They are lightweight and appealing to the eye with the double glass - plus you get two. My beverage stays hot and the cup itself does not bleed heat onto my hands like most coffee cups. You can hold it by the handle or as a cup and both deliver a great morning, wakeful experience with the espresso inside of course. I should have saved my gas and just bought on Amazon versus venturing out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vivien

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for ristretto, espresso, or cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Product exactly as described. Practical for espresso drinkers who might want to vary the size of their coffee from a shot of espresso ("ristretto"), to double shot or perhaps a cup. Problem-free transaction with seller and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Cy Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: We've only used these glasses a few times but love them so far. They are easy to hold and feel like good quality. I can see you have to be careful with the handles and not to hit them on anything because they may break, but that is true for any similar type glasses with handles. Great size too!
customer_reviews.author: G. Hopp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for longo
customer_reviews.text: I got these for Longo espresso and they are the perfect size. Not sure they really keep my espresso much warmer than standard cup but they do a nice job and probably slightly better. They are much lighter than I thought which gives them a "cheap" feel so I took away one star.
customer_reviews.author: howorks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a lungo and keeps it warm long enough to enjoy the whole cup
customer_reviews.text: I bought these since my company recently got an espresso machine, and the paper cups they have are terrible. The espresso doesn't stay warm, and they are really wasteful! These serve their purpose flawlessly. It is the perfect size for a lungo, and it does insulate quite well. It obviously won't stay warm for hours, but it gives plenty of time to sip on and enjoy a good cup of espresso or lungo.
customer_reviews.author: SpartanAlto

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Nespresso Lungo Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I ended up with Nespresso capsules left over from an event, bought a Nespresso machine, and realized I needed something smaller than a mug to hold and keep warm a lungo. They are perfect. Very light weight, and keep a coffee warm for 10 minutes on a winter's day. Will update this review went they break.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Quayle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to review these because I wanted to confirm how sturdy they were. Result: I love them! They look nice, they're the perfect size, and I've found them to be very sturdy--not at all as delicate as they look. I use them all the time and would certainly buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: northofantastic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for cafe lungo. These are more fragile than I anticipated so I will be hand-washing them and handling with extra care. But they are great! The double layer means the outside of the cup doesn't get hot, and the coffee stays hot longer. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great cups, but fragile!
customer_reviews.text: These are great little cups, but apparently we are just too rough with them. We've ordered two sets, and already broken 2 of the four cups. The cups themselves are great - just more fragile than we can handle!
customer_reviews.author: S. H. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Expresso Mugs
customer_reviews.text: The mugs arrived in fine shape and pretty quickly, too. They impress with a high quality feel to them, very similar to some insulated stemless wine glasses by Epare that I bought through Amazon. When you hold them, they just feel nice in your hands. It also has a very comfortable handle.
customer_reviews.author: dvan@VAB

customer_reviews.title: Packaging could be better.....
customer_reviews.text: So fragile, one cup broke as I took the cardboard packing off. Remaining cups work well, and definitely keep espresso very hot. ADDITIONAL COMMENT: Company sent me a replacement set after reading my comment-Fantastic customer service! I am more than satisfied with my purchase now. Several guests have commented positively on the style of the cup, and the temperature retention.
customer_reviews.author: MarkT

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service from seller when I had a problem
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful but condensation builds up between the wall of the glass and the outside. I've only hand washed them...update, I contacted the seller and they are sending out a replacement. Fast and competent customer service! Hopefully the condensation was a one time flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cups!
customer_reviews.text: They keep the temperature and are easily held. We love the transparency to see the flavorful espresso's character. Only criticism is that the base could be squared rather than rounded to be more stable when setting down. Update: We have ordered 2 more as we have greatly enjoyed them
customer_reviews.author: Tim V
